_sText:
mg_sky_bumper_car
=============================================================
[Informations]
In this map are 2 teams (red team and blue team).
In this map you must knife the red/blue cars (the adversary).
The arena is changing every round.
You get each round,either a smokegrenade or a hegenade.
=============================================================
[Control]
You control the car with your computer mouse.
You drive the car with your keyboard.
Each round you spawn in a BMW (red or blue).
==============================================================
For questions or improvement proposals to write me.
Visit me at www.pit-bull-gang.de.
Check it out and have fun.
Please evaluate the map
